name: The Octagon (Multiplayer)
description:
Duel with your friend , who will survive longer within THE OCTAGON.

Avoid obstacles , survive crazy effects(confused,color walls,darkness) , master the art of teleportation and test yourself in this Fast-paced, multiplayer Game inspired by Super Hexagon.

Move(A,D,left , right) , Teleport(W,up)

WARNING

This game features flashing lights and extensive use of stroboscopic effects and should not be played by people susceptible to epileptic seizures or loss of consciousness when exposed to similar effects
